CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.7.1a.2, patientepisodename (250AN) E2B (R2): B.1.10.7.1a.2, parentmedicalepisodename (250AN)
E2B (R3): D.7.1.r.1b Medical History (disease / surgical procedure / etc.) (MedDRA code) E2B (R3): D.10.7.1.r.1b Medical History (disease / surgical procedure / etc.) (MedDRA code) Conformance: Optional, but required if D.10.7.1.r.1a is populated. Data Type: 8N OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.163 Value Allowed: Numeric
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Medical judgment should be exercised in completing this section. Information pertinent to understanding the case is desired, such as diseases, conditions such as pregnancy, surgical procedures, and psychological trauma.
CustomField.label: Disease/Surgical Procedure/Etc.
